title: How to Incorporate Your Startup in Belgium
excerpt: A comprehensive guide to incorporating your startup in Belgium, including legal requirements, costs, and timeline.
author: Graeme Rycyk
content:
Understanding Belgian Business Structures

When incorporating in Belgium, you'll need to choose between several business structures. The most common are:

  • BV/SRL (Private Limited Company)
  • NV/SA (Public Limited Company)
  • CommV/SComm (Limited Partnership)

Step-by-Step Incorporation Process

Here's what you need to do to incorporate your startup...
author_bio: Graeme is a the founder for drijft and previously founded ModerateKit, he has been building and working in the Belgian startup ecosystem in Ghent and Anwterp since 2014, he built and grew messaging app Now Push (part of Start it @KBC) to over 10,000 users, he was an one of the early engineers at Showpad, a Senior Product Manager at Deliverect and CTO of Pawshake.
